=== 1 Malaysia Broadband Carnival 2011 15th - 16th Oct 2011 ===
* Malaysian Government via MAMPU (Malaysian Administrative Modernization and Management Planning Unit) and MCMC (Malaysian Communications and Multimedia Commission) have invited Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo Team to assist in this carnival by introducing Ubuntu to all participants of this event. We proudly guide them for installation and usage on their brand new netbooks provided by MAMPU & MCMC. <<BR>>
<<BR>><nowiki>[[http://www.slideshare.net/fenris/introduction-to-ubuntu-9882652|{{https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-eL-64A8ANHY/TqfIDJJ0thI/AAAAAAAACeo/jvXSeiZWG6s/s400/ubuntu-intro-slide-taiping.jpg}}]]</nowiki> {{https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-umz4CiOcaSU/TqfIDvZmxrI/AAAAAAAACes/y5piSanccj8/s400/broadband-carnival-taiping3.jpg}} {{https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/-8GM4q23thwU/TqfBrSjIUHI/AAAAAAAACeg/IlQ-xZBdaUs/s400/broadband-carnival-taiping2.jpg}} {{https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-u_H3LUCbx1s/Tqe8FUunK_I/AAAAAAAACdg/aPvLtKylKKA/s400/broadband-carnival-taiping.jpg}}

=== Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo Team IRC Meeting (Oct 2011) ===
* Date: '''1st Oct 2011'''
* Time: 11:00 PM
* Venue: Channel #ubuntu-my @ irc.freenode.net
* Agenda:
** Re-Approval of Ubuntu LoCo Malaysian Team. 
** Ubuntu.com.my hosting and domain
** 11.10 Oneiric Release Party
** Ubuntu-MY participation at Open Varsiti 2011, Nov 2011 at UTM Skudai.
** LoCo team to create report/statistics of Ubuntu usage in Malaysia  
* Meeting Log: <nowiki>[[http://ubottu.com/meetingology/logs/ubuntu-my/2011/ubuntu-my.2011-10-01-15.02.moin.txt|IRC Log ubottu.com]]</nowiki>
* Minutes:
** <nowiki>[[ApOgEE | M. Fauzilkamil (apogee)]]</nowiki> chaired the meeting. 
** 1. Re-Approval application. <<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[ApOgEE | M. Fauzilkamil (apogee)]]</nowiki> to update all materials available regarding Re-Approval. <<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[ApOgEE | M. Fauzilkamil (apogee)]]</nowiki> need to remind <nowiki>[[fenris | ejat (fenris)]]</nowiki> regarding date and details about events to be included into ReApproval reports. <<BR>>
** 2. ubuntu.com.my hosting and domain <<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[ApOgEE | M. Fauzilkamil (apogee)]]</nowiki> will collect donations from team community members that is willing to give donations for hosting and domain renewal fees and hand over the donations to <nowiki>[[mypapit | mypapit]]</nowiki><<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[mypapit | mypapit]]</nowiki> and webteam need to bring up back <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu.com.my | planet.ubuntu.com.my]]</nowiki> as soon as possible<<BR>>
** 3. Oneiric release party <<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[ApOgEE | M. Fauzilkamil (apogee)]]</nowiki> will arrange Oneiric release party <<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[MakLan | MakLan]]</nowiki> will lead Ipoh/lumut party. <<BR>>
** 4. ubuntu-my participation at Open Varsiti 2011, Nov 2011, UTM Skudai<<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[jipang_menjerit | jipang_menjerit]]</nowiki> to find someone to manage ubuntu-my booth during that day. <<BR>>
** 5. LoCo team to create report/statistics of Ubuntu usage in Malaysia<<BR>>
     - <nowiki>[[MakLan | MakLan]]</nowiki> to prepare & process questionaire for the survey and submit to team for further discussions. <<BR>>

=== Ubuntu Malaysia LoCo Team IRC Meeting (May 2011) ===
* Date: '''20th May 2011'''
* Time: 11:00 PM
* Venue: Channel #ubuntu-my @ irc.freenode.net
* Agenda:
** Planning for Ubuntu 11.04 Release Party 
** Discussion about Malaysia LoCo Activities in 2011 
** Team <nowiki>[[MalaysianTeam-ApprovalApplication | ReApproval]]</nowiki> Issue
** Planning for Public Awareness Project
** Planning for Malaysian Open Source Conference 2011 Participation.
* Meeting Log: <nowiki>[[http://pastebin.ubuntu.com/610951/ | IRC Log]]</nowiki>
* Minutes:
** During this meeting, <nowiki>[[ApOgEE | M. Fauzilkamil (apogee)]]</nowiki> have been voted to Chair the meeting.
** 1. Ubuntu 11.04 (Natty Narwhal) Release Party<<BR>> 
   - Majority vote that it will be held at Ampang Point (Restoran Kayu Nasi Kandar near Pertonas) <<BR>>
   - Majority vote that it will be held on 5/6/2011, Sunday, 11:00AM <<BR>>
   - Majority vote that RM15 per person will be collected to cover event cost, which consist of Party Cake, Food & Drinks, some gifts <<BR>>
** 2. Planning to promote more team member to be Official Ubuntu Member. <<BR>> 
   - this plan will need further discussion. To be continue on http://forums.ubuntu.com.my <<BR>> 
** 3. Public Awareness Project<<BR>> 
   - '''Tajul''' have been assigned to lead '''Ubuntu Awareness Campaign''' at Matriculation College around Malaysia. There are 13 colleges in Tajul's list under Ministry Of Education (MOE). <<BR>> 
   - During this Campaign, we are going to do Demo Session, UX Talks, Share CD, distribute stickers & goodies during this event. <<BR>> 
   - we will donate some money, get some sponsors to support CD distribution, sticker printing & bunting/banner. Hopefully, <nowiki>[[fenris]]</nowiki> can help to get some Official Ubuntu CD & goodies from Canonical. <<BR>> 
   - <nowiki>[[ApOgEE]]</nowiki> can donate some DIY Ubuntu Community Stickers for this project. <<BR>> 
   - further discussion will continue on http://forums.ubuntu.com.my <<BR>> 
** 4. Ubuntu-my Malaysia OSS Event Participation <<BR>> 
   - we will participate in LinuxVarsity project <<BR>> 
   - we will participate in MOSC2011 event <<BR>> 
** 5. Translation Project <<BR>> 
   - we will continue translation project and will encourage more translator to work on ms-translations. https://edge.launchpad.net/~ms-translators <<BR>> 
** 6. Web Team Is Back <<BR>> 
   - the web team is back in business. We are going to update our wiki, forums, planet and main site. <<BR>> 
** 7. Ubuntu-my LoCo <nowiki>[[MalaysianTeam-ApprovalApplication | ReApproval]]</nowiki> <<BR>> 
   - Gathering previous activities info and updating main MalaysianTeam LoCo wiki for ReApproval. <<BR>> 
   - Train new team member to update wiki guided by <nowiki>[[ApOgEE]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[Gunbladeiv]]</nowiki>. <<BR>> 
   - other plans like ROS registration will be discussed on Mailing List. <<BR>>
